verses.verse: He <S%H7121>cried<s%> also in my <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Cause them that have <S%H6486>charge<s%> over the <S%H5892>city<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, even every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4892>destroying<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

<S%H8337>And<s%>, behold, six <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5945>higher<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, which <S%H6437>lies<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4660>slaughter<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen<s%>, with a <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>: and they went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, whereupon he <S%H4670>was<s%>, to the threshold of the <S%H1004>house<s%>. And he <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen<s%>, which had the <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>;

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>him<s%>, Go through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H8427>set<s%> a <S%H8420>mark<s%> upon the <S%H4696>foreheads<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H584>sigh<s%> and that <S%H602>cry<s%> for all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that be <S%H6213>done<s%> in the midst <S%H8432>there<s%>.

And to the <S%H428>others<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing<s%>, <S%H5674>Go<s%> you <S%H310>after<s%> him through the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5221>strike<s%>: let not your <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither have you <S%H2550>pity<s%>:

<S%H2026>Kill<s%> <S%H4889>utterly<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H970>young<s%>, both <S%H1330>maids<s%>, and little <S%H2945>sons<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%>: but come not <S%H5066>near<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> upon whom is the <S%H8420>mark<s%>; and <S%H2490>begin<s%> at my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>. Then they <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H2205>ancient<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> which were <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2930>them<s%>, Defile the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2691>courts<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain<s%>: go you <S%H3318>forth<s%>. And they went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H5221>killed<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And it came to <S%H5221>pass<s%>, while they were slaying <S%H7604>them<s%>, and I was left, that I <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>! will you <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in your pouring <S%H8210>out<s%> of your <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H5771>me<s%>, The iniquity of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4297>perverseness<s%>: for they <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> sees <S%H7200>not<s%>.
And as for me <S%H5869>also<s%>, my eye shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>, but I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon their <S%H7218>head<s%>.

<S%H376>And<s%>, behold, the man <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen<s%>, which had the <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>, <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have <S%H6213>done<s%> as you have commanded <S%H6680>me<s%>.
